name: Afterlife 2: Rickard's Journey
description:
When heroic adventurer Rickard Bronson entered the Afterlife to recover and restore the ten stolen Cruciforms, and lock shut once more the Gates of Hell, he was successful in his most dangerous quest to date. But questions remained unanswered: who was responsible for the theft? And why?

Now, the ancient order of the Brotherhood of the Gatekeepers has again summoned Rickard's aid. Can the daredevil explorer finally unmask the identity of the culprit and put a stop to their schemes once and for all, or do further mysteries and revelations lie in wait for Rickard upon his return to the Afterlife?

Afterlife 2: Rickard's Journey is an epic narrative platformer, in which dashing hero Rickard Bronson returns to the Thirteen Realms of Hell to complete the journey of discovery he began in Afterlife: Rickard's Quest.

Armed with his trusty hand-bombs and Deadly Hunting Umbrella, and aided by an assortment of arcane treasures looted from the Realms of Hell, can he put a stop to his mysterious foe's dastardly plans?

Work began on Afterlife 2: Rickard's Journey in the summer of 2006. Three years later, with a lot of help from some great people, the sequel to Afterlife: Rickard's Quest was released on the 18th of May 2009, and features a huge single-player game, complete with special stages, hidden secrets and an unlockable split-screen multiplayer game.

For those curious, a full detailed changelog of the game's updates is available here, and forums can be found here to discuss the game or seek help, hints and tips.
